title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: download, build and run large language models locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library that wraps Ollama’s REST API for easy LLM inference in Python scripts.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to talk with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LangChain LLMs & embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat-style interface) for Ollama, built with SvelteKit and deployed as a container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing typed wrappers for every Ollama REST endpoint.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that layers conversation management, history, and prompts atop Ollama.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem exposing Ollama generate/chat APIs with idiomatic Ruby objects and blocks.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for building RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app template that streams Ollama responses into the browser.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose files for running Ollama server plus GPU support.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module exposing Ollama services with decorators for dependency injection and streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate offering strongly-typed async clients for Ollama.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat endpoints, admin panels, and model management UI.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK supporting .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming and System.Text.Json.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models through slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized models ready to pull into Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter repo combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for question answering.
